Pruebo mi funcion del canion

```{r}
tiro <- function(d,h, col){
  a <- -h/(d/2)^2
  b <- 4*h/d
  c <- h+a*(d/2)^2
  
  curve(a*x^2+b*x+10+c, from = 0, to = d, add = TRUE, col = col)
}
tiro(1000,10, "green")
tiro(100,10, "blue")
tiro(100,5, "red")
```
